review: When it works, the Fire Stick is fantastic. However, it is designed to go into sleep mode after 30 minutes of inactivity. That's fine with me, especially since my children never turn anything off. The major problem is that the Fire Stick won't wake back up. I spend each time I want to watch my shows troubleshooting and getting frustrated because it won't wake up. If Amazon can fix this problem or put an on/off switch on it, the product will be great. As it is, I can't even use it.
author: Jason Russell
